intro: Psychotria casiguraensis, commonly known as the Mindanao Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically found in lowland and montane rainforests. Due to its restricted distribution and habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species.
